${ModID}:ColdSeason.NAME: Cold Season
${ModID}:ColdSeason.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy loses HP from ${ModID}:Frostbite, apply !M! ${ModID}:Frostbite.

${ModID}:FrigidBody.NAME: Frigid Body
${ModID}:FrigidBody.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, apply ${ModID}:Frostbite equal to blocked damage.

${ModID}:Frostburn.NAME: Frostburn
${ModID}:Frostburn.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Frostbite to ALL enemies. NL Add a *Burn into your discard pile.

${ModID}:GrowingAffliction.NAME: Growing Affliction
${ModID}:GrowingAffliction.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Whenever you apply a debuff, return this from the discard pile to your hand.

${ModID}:IcicleSpear.NAME: Icicle Spear
${ModID}:IcicleSpear.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Frostbite.

${ModID}:InsultToInjury.NAME: Insult to Injury
${ModID}:InsultToInjury.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Repeat for each unique debuff the enemy has.

${ModID}:Subdue.NAME: Subdue
${ModID}:Subdue.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL If the last card played in this combat was an Attack, gain !B! additional Block.
